pagetree <- xml2::read_html(x = 'https://www.gesetze-im-internet.de/ifsg/BJNR104510000.html')
xml_root(pagetree)
xml_length(pagetree)
xml_children(pagetree)
xml_child(pagetree, search = 2)
xml_children(pagetree) %>% xml_attr("jnentitel")
spans <- xml_find_all(pagetree, ".//span")

print(spans, n=130)
